response.overview: Me and my friends had plenty of fun with skateboarders in the past. I decided to try the skate park near my office. On the way there I met 18-year-old skater, Adam. I was going to fuck the cutie no matter what but first I had to convince him to follow me instead. During a nice winter walk through the streets of Prague, I met a jogger. He borrowed money and wasn't able to repay the loan, he was months behind the schedule.  I noticed a young man picking up leaves. He left his home country to find a better life in Europe. He worked as a masseur but wasn't making much. My office was nearby so I offered him to give me a quick massage there. I was so horny that I had to go out and get some fresh air. Despite the cold I decided to have a walk and look for cuties. After a while I noticed a young man with rollerblades in his hand.The guy was 25 years old and was already a father. These are difficult times for young families, so I wasn't surprised to hear about his financial problems.
